title: Implementing an AI Chatbot for Enhanced Information Access with LLM and RAG
summary: Development of an AI-based chatbot using the RAG method at Catur Insan Cendekia University to enhance fast and contextual information access.

title: AI Chatbot for Health Research using RAG and LLM
summary: Built an AI chatbot using RAG and LLMs to help health researchers access accurate information during an internship at PT. Inti Utama Solusindo.

title: Image Detection and Classification with YOLOv11
summary: This project uses YOLOv11 to detect palm trees with numbered boxes and classify apples by color, saving cropped images accordingly.

title: Trash Image Classification using Pre-trained Vision Transformer (ViT)
summary: This project implements an image classification system using a pre-trained Vision Transformer (ViT) from Hugging Face, fine-tuned to classify waste images into six categories

title: Quisiin: Questionnaire Marketplace
summary: An App-Based Questionnaire Marketplace to Help Gather Data for Specific Targets.

title: Assetify: Know the Price, Make it Wise!
summary: Assetify uses data and machine learning to accurately predict housing prices in Jakarta amid fluctuating market factors like location, facilities, and economic conditions.

title: Implementation of Career Center Information System at UCIC
summary: The Career Center Information System at Catur Insan Cendekia University is a web-based application built with Laravel (PHP) and MySQL, featuring two main user roles.

title: Task Management App - Backend
summary: The Task Management App backend is a FastAPI-based, Dockerized API using JWT and Supabase for secure and scalable task and user management.

title: Photo Studio Booking App â€“ QM Studio Photo
summary: QM Studio Photo is a Flutter-based mobile app that enables easy photo studio booking with GetX for state management and Firebase (including Google Auth) for backend services.
